title: Verify theme switching functionality and persistence
description: Test that the user can toggle between light and dark themes and the chosen theme persists across page reloads via localStorage.

steps.description: Navigate to the homepage.
Click the theme toggle button to switch to dark mode.
Verify that the site theme updates to dark mode with the cosmic/starry background.
Reload the page.
Verify that dark mode is still active after reload.
Click the theme toggle button to switch back to light mode.
Verify that site theme updates to the Apple-inspired light mode.
Reload the page.
Verify that light mode persists after reload.

title: Validate navigation bar links and buttons for desktop and mobile
description: Ensure Work, About, Contact links, Email, and Resume download buttons function correctly and responsive behavior on various screen sizes.

steps.description: Load the site on desktop viewport.
Click the Work link.
Confirm navigation to the Work (Projects) page.
Click the About link.
Confirm navigation to the About page.
Click the Contact link.
Verify that the contact modal opens.
Click on the Email call-to-action button.
Verify default mail client opens with correct email address.
Click on the Resume download button.
Verify that the resume file is downloaded.
Resize the viewport to mobile dimensions.
Verify navigation bar collapses or adapts for mobile, and all links and buttons remain visible and tappable.
Tap each navigation link and buttons on mobile view.
Verify correct navigations and actions for each tap.

title: Verify hero section 3D animated text and profile image
description: Check the hero section loading with animated 3D text effects, professional summary, and profile image with border styling.

steps.description: Open the homepage.
Verify 3D animated text is displayed with smooth continuous animation.
Verify professional summary text is present and matches the latest resume content.
Confirm profile image is displayed with correct border effects and is responsive on different device sizes.

title: Verify Experience section card layout and hover effects
description: Check experience cards display job details correctly, show achievement bullet points, and respond with animations on hover.

steps.description: Navigate to the Experience section on the homepage.
Verify all professional experience cards are visible with correct job titles, companies, dates, and descriptions.
Hover over each experience card.
Verify that hover animations trigger smoothly and achievement bullet points are highlighted.
Resize viewport to mobile and tablet sizes.
Verify cards layout adjusts responsively and hover effects are replaced with suitable touch interactions.

title: Validate Projects section grid layout and displayed technologies
description: Check that more than 6 projects display in a responsive grid with technology stack icons and no images or 'View Details' buttons.

steps.description: Navigate to the Projects/Work page.
Verify at least 6 project cards are displayed in a responsive grid layout.
Check each project card displays correct technology stack icons or emojis.
Confirm no project images or 'View Details' buttons are present.
Resize viewport to test responsiveness on mobile and tablet.
Verify the grid adapts layout correctly and is usable on all device sizes.

title: Verify Skills section grouping and animated grid layout
description: Ensure six skill groups with technology icons/emojis appear grouped and arranged in an animated, responsive grid.

steps.description: Visit the Skills section on the homepage.
Confirm six distinct skill groups are displayed with appropriate icons or emojis.
Verify the grid layout is animated with smooth entrance animations using Framer Motion.
Resize screen for mobile and tablet.
Ensure the skills grid adjusts responsively and remains visually clear.

title: Validate Education section timeline layout and animations
description: Check the education timeline displays compact info boxes with consistent heading styles and smooth Framer Motion animations.

steps.description: Scroll to or navigate to Education section.
Verify timeline events show education entries with institution names and titles using consistent headings.
Confirm info boxes are compact and visually uniform.
Observe and confirm that timeline animations trigger smoothly on scroll.
Test on mobile and tablet screen sizes.
Ensure timeline remains readable, animated, and layout adjusts responsively.

title: Test Contact modal form validation and submission
description: Open the contact modal, verify form validation behaviors, alternative contact methods, and successful submission with confirmation feedback.

steps.description: Click Contact link or button to open the contact modal.
Verify the contact modal appears properly and is mobile-optimized.
Attempt to submit the form with empty required fields.
Verify validation errors are displayed for required fields.
Fill form fields with invalid email and incomplete data.
Attempt to submit the form.
Verify form prevents submission and displays email format validation errors.
Fill the form correctly with valid name, email, and message.
Submit the form.
Confirm successful submission with a confirmation message or modal feedback.
Verify alternative contact methods (Email link, GitHub, LinkedIn) are visible and open the correct links.

title: Validate real-time clock updates in navigation bar
description: Ensure the integrated real-time clock in the glass morphism navigation bar displays current time and date accurately and updates dynamically.

steps.description: Open the homepage.
Verify the clock displays the current system time and date initially.
Wait for at least 2 minutes.
Confirm the clock updates dynamically and matches the system time.

title: Check website accessibility compliance (WCAG 2.1 AA)
description: Evaluate the site to ensure compliance with WCAG 2.1 AA standards including keyboard navigation, screen reader compatibility, color contrast, and accessible labels.

steps.description: Navigate through all main pages and sections using only keyboard.
Verify all interactive elements are reachable and operable via keyboard.
Use screen reader software to navigate the website.
Confirm screen reader announces all important information correctly and navigation landmarks are defined.
Check color contrast ratios meet WCAG 2.1 AA minimum standards on all themes.
Ensure all images and icons have appropriate alternative text or aria-label attributes.

title: Cross-browser compatibility verification
description: Test the website on Chrome, Safari, and Firefox on desktop and iOS Safari, Chrome Mobile on mobile to ensure consistent behavior and appearance.

steps.description: Open the website on desktop Chrome.
Verify all core functionalities and visual layouts work correctly.
Repeat steps for desktop Safari and Firefox.
Open the website on iOS Safari and Chrome Mobile.
Verify responsive design, navigation, theme toggling, contact modal, and animations function without errors.

title: Check performance and smoothness of animations and page load
description: Measure and verify animations trigger smoothly without jank, and pages load quickly meeting 60fps standards on modern devices.

steps.description: Load the homepage and navigate across multiple sections.
Observe Framer Motion animations (page transitions, hover effects) for smoothness.
Verify no animation stuttering or frame drops occur.
Measure page load time using browser dev tools performance tab.
Confirm page load times and animation frame rates meet or exceed smooth 60fps standards on tested devices.

title: Verify custom analytics tracking of user interactions and page views
description: Ensure that the custom analytics hook tracks correct page views and user interactions data is collected per specification.

steps.description: Open the website and navigate across key pages (Home, Work, About, Contact).
Verify analytics events are triggered for page views.
Interact with elements such as theme toggle, navigation links, and contact form submissions.
Verify corresponding user interaction events are tracked by the analytics system.
Check network requests or logs to confirm analytics endpoint receives correct data.

title: Validate mobile-first responsiveness and touch-friendly interactions
description: Check the site on various mobile devices for proper responsive text sizing, touch target sizes, and smooth scrolling.

steps.description: Open the website on multiple mobile devices and emulators.
Verify text sizes are readable without zoom and UI elements have adequate touch target sizes.
Ensure navigation and modal forms respond correctly to touch gestures.
Scroll through long pages and sections.
Verify scrolling is smooth and no layout breakage occurs.
